actions.description: The collector makes two Slam attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (3d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 16 (3d10) necrotic damage.
actions.name: Slam

actions.description: The collector releases paralyzing gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a successful DC 18 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. A paralyzed creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself with a success.
actions.name: Paralyzing Breath (Recharge 5-6)

conditionImmunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
damageImmunities: necrotic, poison, psychic; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
languages: understands all languages but can't speak
name: Cadaver Collector [MoM]

specialTraits.description: The collector has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
specialTraits.name: Magic Resistance

specialTraits.description: The collector doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.
specialTraits.name: Unusual Nature
